metadata.title: CVE-2023-4256 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - low
metadata.description: Within tcpreplay's tcprewrite, a double free vulnerability has beenidentified in the tcpedit_dlt_cleanup() function withinplugins/dlt_plugins.c. This vulnerability can be exploited by supplying aspecifically crafted file to the tcprewrite binary. This flaw enables alocal attacker to initiate a Denial of Service (DoS) attack.

criterions.comment: tcpreplay: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
